calculateTFIDFForAllWords() - Method in class nlp.TFIDFHandler
Calculate the tf*idf value for each word and store it into its MyDocument object where it belongs to.

ComponentRegistry - Class in registry
A registry class for various components in Overherd.
CONTENT_ANALYZED - Static variable in class registry.ValueRegistry
Make it true if the lengthy content analysis is done, so it'll only process once.

To keep track of which "mode" the author-topic view's content viewer currently is.

To keep track of which "mode" the author-topic view's content viewer currently is.
countConversationInstance(String) - Method in class ui.authormap.data.UserConversationMap
Counts and returns the number of conversation this student had with otherUser.
countConversationInstances() - Method in class ui.authormap.data.UserConversationMap
Counts and returns the number of conversations this student had with all others.
countUsersTalkedTo() - Method in class ui.authormap.data.UserConversationMap
Counts and returns the number of students this student talked to.
